Title: New World of Clean electricity
ace_sentences: I notice that China has the greatest rate of change.
I notice that the US stays more constant.
All the countries use more clean energy.
I wonder why all the countries use more clean energy.
I wonder if the economy affects the type of electricity.
This relates to me and my community.
My community is part of the US.
The US does not increase its electricity.
The US still uses non-clean electricity.
The title is: New World of Clean electricity.
